org.qualitune.naoservice.client
Class Nao.ALRedBallDetection

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.Nao.ALRedBallDetection
Enclosing class:
Nao
public static final class Nao.ALRedBallDetection
extends java.lang.Object

ALRedBallDetection is a module which can detect red ball based on color saturation.

subscribe

public org.json.JSONObject subscribe(java.lang.String name,
                                     int period,
                                     float precision)
Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData(\"keyName\"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you.

Parameters:
name - Name of the module which subscribes.
period - Refresh period (in milliseconds) if relevant.
precision - Precision of the extractor if relevant.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

subscribe

public org.json.JSONObject subscribe(java.lang.String name)
Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData(\"keyName\"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you.

Parameters:
name - Name of the module which subscribes.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)
